pr_title: [DROOLS-5443] Move DMN-PMML tests to a separate module

timeline.message: [DROOLS-5443] Move DMN-PMML tests to a separate module

timeline.bodyText:
Hi @jiripetrlik
Is this dependency management needed ?
timeline.author: gitgabrio

replies.bodyText:
@gitgabrio
Unfortunately yes, without it I'm getting the following error:
The project org.kie:kie-dmn-pmml-tests-trusty:7.40.0-SNAPSHOT (/home/jpetrlik/devel/github/kiegroup/drools/kie-dmn/kie-dmn-pmml-tests-parent/kie-dmn-pmml-tests-trusty/pom.xml) has 1 error
[ERROR]     'dependencies.dependency.version' for org.kie:kie-pmml-dependencies:pom is missing. @ line 32, column 17
Maybe we can add this artifact to some higher level bom. But it is probably out of scope of this PR.
replies.author: jiripetrlik
